mapper.sql: id, code, name, remark, parent_id, sort, created, short_name, address, longtitude, latitude, status, business_model, is_enabled, type

order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into fine_org (id, code, name, remark, parent_id, sort, created, short_name, address, longtitude, latitude, status, business_model, is_enabled, type ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longtitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{businessModel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
